questions.title: 1 - Monitor the health of the analytics pipelines

choices.title: Best Practice 1.1 - Validate the data quality of source systems before moving to analytics

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 1.1.1 - Implement data validation mechanisms; Suggestion 1.1.2 - Notify stakeholders and use business logic to determine how to remediate data that is not valid.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 1.2 - Monitor the planned arrival of recent data from the source systems

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 1.2.1 - Monitor for the arrival or availability of new data, and notify if the expected duration between data arrival is too long.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 1.3 - Define and measure the schedules of recurring analytics jobs

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 1.3.1 - Monitor the start time for recurring analytics processing jobs compared to the expected start time.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 1.4 - Define and measure the runtime durations of analytics jobs

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 1.4.1 - Monitor the start and end times for analytics processing steps or the overall analytics job.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

questions.title: 2 - Modernize deployment of the analytics jobs and applications

choices.title: Best Practice 2.1 - Use version control for job and application changes

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 2.1.1 - Implement infrastructure as code and application logic version control systems.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 2.2 - Set up testing data and a staging environment

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 2.2.1 - Use a curated dataset to test application logic and performance improvements, such that code changes can be comparatively analyzed for the desired outcomes; Suggestion 2.2.2 - Use a random sample of recent data to validate application edge cases and regressions have not been introduced; Suggestion 2.2.3 - Establish separate staging environments to fully test changes before going live.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 2.3 - Test and validate analytics jobs and application deployments

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 2.3.1 - Automate the deployment and testing of changes to infrastructure and applications.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 2.4 - Roll back failed deployments and backfill the data

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 2.4.1 - Use infrastructure as code and version control systems so that a failed deployment can be rolled back to a previous good state.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 2.5 - Build standard operating procedures for deployment, test, rollback, and backfill tasks

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 2.5.1 - Document and use standard operating procedures for implementing changes in your analytics workload.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.

choices.title: Best Practice 2.6 - Automate the standard operating procedures

helpfulResource.displayText: Suggestion 2.6.1 - Use automation to perform changes to underlying analytics infrastructure or application logic.

improvementPlan.displayText: You must have improvement plans per choice. It's optional whether or not to have a corresponding URL.
